arts.ttl: Atlético slump in LaLiga continues as Barrios red card cedes initiative to Barcelona
arts.sum: Atleti have now conceded seven penalties this season, four coming in the Champions League and three in La Liga. Earlier on Saturday, Real Madrid also drew by the same scoreline, were reduced to ten men, and conceded a penalty, giving Atleti a chance to take their spot.

arts.ttl: Ratings: Error-prone Atlético cannot take advantage of Real Madrid slip-up
arts.sum: His ball forward to Alexander Sørloth in the 81st minute was just enough for the striker to work with and level the match. A strong showing from the veteran, who passed the ball with confidence and put in some needed defensive work in the midfield.

arts.ttl: Advantage Barcelona: Atlético Madrid star facing up to suspension after straight red card
arts.sum: La Liga giants Atlético Madrid have on Saturday evening been dealt a blow on the personnel front. This comes owing to developments early in the club’s latest outing. Atlético are…

arts.ttl: Chelsea transfer news: Atletico Madrid 'plotting ambitious move' for attacker
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid are reportedly contemplating whether to make an approach for a Chelsea attacker during the summer transfer window.

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone reflects on his favourite competition amid Atlético Madrid title race and cup runs
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone spoke before the team’s La Liga fixture against Celta Vigo to praise his squad after three days off this week, also addressing the Copa del Rey draw, injuries and the title race. “We understood that the boys had made a great effort because of Saturday’s game, we gave them three days rest, we started on Wednesday with the enthusiasm we were looking for and we want to continue in the same vein.”

arts.ttl: ‘The best’ – Diego Simeone in fresh praise of Hansi Flick’s Barcelona
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid head coach Diego Simeone has on Friday again moved to reveal his appreciation for La Liga rivals Barcelona. Atlético, of course, were this week made aware of a…

arts.ttl: 2 in, 2 out: Celta Vigo name squad for Atlético clash
arts.sum: The squad of players set to be depended upon by Celta Vigo for their upcoming showdown with Atlético Madrid has on Friday been unveiled online. And it features noteworthy inclusions…

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich and Chelsea interested in Atletico Madrid midfielder Pablo Barrios
arts.sum: Bild reports that Bayern Munich and Chelsea are both interested in Atletico Madrid midfield Pablo Barrios, but he is unlikely to come cheap. Bayern are in the process of shaking up…

arts.ttl: LaLiga injury news, predicted lineups, fantasy updates
arts.sum: Find out who is missing through injury and who is in a race against time to prove their fitness in Spain's LaLiga this weekend.

A victory for Atletico Madrid will see them return to the top of La Liga if Real Madrid fail to win on Saturday, while they could also drop down to third if results don't go their way. Celta Vigo wil...
